properties.name: 1 - @ the old bag's place
properties.description: Posted by RencattivaFrom 19/01/2006 to 18/02/2006 Designed place the spend the 1st month in Quebec. Manu occupied the other room when I got there. The main dweller called the police and kicked me out because I had guests for dinner past 10pm.

properties.name: 1st.- Salamanca
properties.description: Posted by Rencattiva

properties.name: 2 - @ Manu's place
properties.description: Posted by RencattivaFrom 19/02/2006 to 28/02/2006 Temporarily, while waiting for the definitive house, Manu took me in her small apartment where the lock used to get frozen.

properties.name: 3 - @ Nowhere in the woods
properties.description: Posted by RencattivaFrom 01/03/2006 to 13/05/2006 Indeed, nowhere in the woods, what turned out to be a terrible mistake, choosing the male flat mates and the place itself. Who wants to be in the middle of nowhere sharing roof with a psycho?

properties.name: 4 - @ the Goblin's B&B, upper floor
properties.description: Posted by RencattivaFrom 13/05/2006 to 15/05/2007 Brief stay. Seems nice, the bed is big and comfy, but that is just a false 1st general impression. At least, in the upper floor there is a slight feeling of privacy. A sea of Post-Its reminds the guest the rules of the house: no cooking after 9, no shower after 10...

properties.name: 5 - @ Antonio's place
properties.description: Posted by RencattivaFrom 16/05/2006 to 22/05/2006 The Spanish house was my salvation during the days without availability at the Goblin\'s. Thanks!!

properties.name: 6 - Back at the Goblin's, ground floor
properties.description: Posted by RencattivaFrom 22/05/2006 to 31/05/2006 Necessity forced me to go back at the Goblin\'s. Now at the ground floor, I\'m surrounded with benefits: my own private entry to the room, a huge jacuzzi next door, a bigger kitchen... and post-its everywhere reminding me every detail of life, even how to flush the toilet. The goblin made sure to spy on every movement of his guests. In the end, after paying him a great load of money for his hospitality, he asked for more through obscure means. I left for never coming close again.

properties.name: 7 - @ Red's place
properties.description: Posted by RencattivaFrom 01/06/2006 to xx/0x/2007 Everybody left so I could move in. It was a nice detail, that turns out to have a boomerang effect. Charming place, deeply emotional, with one and then two cats.
